Balance Explanation:

  • Withdrawable Balance: Funds ready for immediate withdrawal. Released from pending balance after the delay period based on your vendor level.
  • Pending Balance: Funds from shipped orders that are waiting to be released. The release delay depends on your vendor level (Level 1: 7 days, Level 2: 5 days, Level 3: 3 days, Level 4: 1 day, Level 5: 0 days).
  • Current Pending Sales: Total amount of orders that are paid but not yet shipped. These orders reduce your available sales capacity.
